Professional Summary

Four years of experience implementing various applications on images (partially on signals) like OCR, Object Detection,
Face Detection (Recognition), Segmentation, Noise Removal, Texture Analysis, and Streaming Optimization, using the
advantages of deep-learning and machine-learning-based approaches in companies and on different projects.

These developing experiences were sometimes accompanied by the responsibility of being the product owner of the
projects from zero to the sale state; this gave me valuable insights into unpredictable challenges on the path of evolution.

The aforementioned projects are primarily deployed with the Python programming language; some others are with C++
and Matlab, especially those academic ones.
